title.narrative: Assistance alimentaire d’urgence et appui à la restauration rapide des moyens de subsistance des ménages en difficulté alimentaire sévère suite à l’impact de l’El niño dans le Sud de Madagascar

description.narrative: The objective of this joint project by WFP and FAO is to respond to food insecurity. WFP will provide food to 142,000 people and cash to 27,000, while FAO will distribute short-cycle seeds and tools to some 16,200 households in order to support their agricultural production.

participating-org.narrative: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)

owner-org.narrative: UN OCHA Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF)

organisation.narrative: UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA)

mailing-address.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA), Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF), 2 United Nations Plaza (DC2), East 44th street (13th floor), United Nations, New York, USA

description.narrative: Disbursement to CERF Project Assistance alimentaire d’urgence et appui à la restauration rapide des moyens de subsistance des ménages en difficulté alimentaire sévère suite à l’impact de l’El niño dans le Sud de Madagascar

receiver-org.narrative: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)

title.narrative: RESIDENT / HUMANITARIAN COORDINATOR REPORT ON THE USE OF CERF FUNDS MADAGASCAR RAPID RESPONSE DROUGHT 2016

condition.narrative: CERF funding is based on an agreed proposal, including specific planned outcomes and outputs.
